autorisation_participer_texte: I understand that respecting the mission, principles, and regulations of the Association des Scouts du Canada (ASC) is an essential condition for membership. I understand that participation in the ASC program is voluntary and involves certain inherent risks. I acknowledge being informed of the inherent risks of ASC activities. The risks members may face are, particularly but not limited to: injuries due to falls or other movements (sprains, strains, fractures, etc.); injuries with blunt or cutting objects; hypothermia; injuries resulting from accidental or non-accidental contact between individuals; food allergy; contact with water or drowning; burns or heat-related issues. I have read and commit to signing the risk acceptance form.
autorisation_photos_videos: I authorize the Association des Scouts du Canada and its affiliated organizations to use photos and videos of the registered member.

consentement_photos_videos: Consent to Use Photos and Videos
consentement_photos_videos_label: Authorization to use photos and videos
consentement_photos_videos_texte: Throughout the year, leaders, parents, and staff of the Association des Scouts du Canada (ASC) take photos and videos of members during scouting activities. These photos and videos are usually kept in the group photo albums and published on the group’s website. Some photos and videos are sometimes given to local newspapers, partners to promote scouting, communication services of the Association, and can be used for ASC publications or promotional material.
consentement_soins_medicaux_label: I authorize volunteers to administer medical care
consentement_soins_medicaux_texte: Permission for qualified volunteers to administer first aid or authorize medical or ambulance care in case of emergency if respondents and/or any other designated person cannot be reached.
covid19_maladies_infectieuses_texte: I acknowledge the highly contagious nature of COVID-19 and other infectious diseases, and I voluntarily assume the risk that I may be exposed to or infected as a result of participating in activities organized by the Association des Scouts du Canada and its agents. I recognize that such exposure or infection may result in injury, illness, or other health conditions.
declaration_parent_tuteur_texte: If the participant is under 18: I confirm that I am the parent or guardian of a minor participant and that I am signing this risk acceptance and waiver form on behalf of this child as their legal guardian. I declare that I have informed the minor of all the aforementioned risks or any other risks I am aware of, and I will ensure the minor is removed from activities if I deem the risks too great for them.
declaration_sante: I declare that neither I nor anyone living under my roof has shown cold or flu symptoms (including fever, cough, sore throat, respiratory illness, or breathing difficulties) in the last 14 days.
declaration_sante_label: I declare that neither I nor anyone in my household has shown symptoms
declaration_voyage: I declare that neither I nor anyone living under my roof has traveled or had a layover outside Canada in the last 14 days. If I travel outside Canada after signing this declaration, I agree not to participate or attend activities of the Association des Scouts du Canada and its agents for at least 14 days after my return from travel.

infoText_camp_details:
2024 Timberwolves Fall Camp

Cost: $25.00 for Registrations

From: Friday, October 18
Check-in: 6:30 PM at the CWP Longhouse, 4865 County Road 8

To: Sunday, October 20
Pick-up: 11:30 AM at the CWP Longhouse, 4865 County Road 8
infoText_permission: In connection with scouting activities, experience has shown that there are times when illness or accidents may occur, and where immediate surgical or medical attention is necessary. This is my permission for the Leader-in-charge or his/her deputy to make arrangements for surgical or medical attention for my child/ward in the event of an emergency, without the necessity of my prior approval. I understand that I will be notified by the quickest means possible if this authority is exercised.

paragraphe_acceptation_risque: By signing this document, I acknowledge being informed about the inherent risks of scouting and its activities, whether current or future, regardless of the level of supervision as well as the level of my ability and experience. Additionally, there is no factor or condition that I should disclose to the organizers that would make my participation in scouting activities dangerous. I also acknowledge that it is my duty to follow the rules, instructions, and methods applicable to the activities I participate in.
parent_tuteur_confirmation: I confirm that I am the parent or guardian of a minor participant and that I sign this risk acceptance and waiver form on my behalf as the guardian/parent of this child. I declare that I have informed the minor of all the above risks or any other risk I may be aware of and will ensure to remove this minor from activities if I believe the risks are too great for them.

protection_renseignements_personnels_tex: The Association des Scouts du Canada (ASC) and its affiliated organizations are committed to respecting the privacy of its members. The information from this form will be stored in the "Scouts Canada Information System" (SCIS), a secure database with limited access. The information will be used by the ASC and its affiliated organizations to fulfill their respective missions. By signing this form, I give permission to the ASC and its affiliated organizations to disclose this information if needed.

responsabilite_groupe_district_texte: It is solely my responsibility to safeguard my belongings and to respect the rules of conduct that apply to me according to the circumstances, customs, or law, so as not to cause damage to others, including their property. Except for cases prohibited by law or contrary to public order, I release the scouting group and district responsible for the troop, their administrators, officers, employees, volunteers, agents, and representatives from any liability for any damage I may suffer due to scouting activities or my participation in any activities sanctioned by the relevant scouting group and district, regardless of the cause or nature. To this end, I hereby waive any recourse against the aforementioned persons.
risque_animaux_plantes: Contact with wild animals or poisonous/irritating plants
risque_blessures_chutes: Injuries from falls or other movements (sprains, strains, fractures, etc.)
risque_blessures_contact: Injuries resulting from accidental or non-accidental contact between individuals
risque_blessures_objets: Injuries with blunt or cutting objects (branch, material, etc.)
risque_brulures: Burns or heat-related issues (fires, heating equipment, sun, temperature, etc.)
risque_hypothermie: Cold or hypothermia, including contact with water or drowning
risque_vol_perte_objets: Theft, loss, or damage (accidental or not) of personal objects (glasses, clothing, material, etc.)
risques_activites_dangers_texte:
I accept and acknowledge that there are risks in scouting that may cause losses, injuries, or death. These risks are identified below:

  • Injuries due to falls or other movements (sprains, strains, fractures, etc.);
  • Injuries from blunt or sharp objects (branches, equipment, etc.);
  • Injuries resulting from accidental or non-accidental contact between individuals;
  • Cold or hypothermia, including water contact and drowning;
  • Burns or issues due to heat (fires, heating equipment, sun, temperature, etc.);
  • Severe allergies;
  • Contact with wild animals or poisonous or irritating plants;
  • Theft, loss, or damage (accidental or not) of personal items (glasses, clothing, equipment, etc.);
  • Failure of individual protective equipment;
  • Negligent behavior from others;
  • Death.
risques_inherents_activites_texte: By signing this document, I acknowledge having been informed of the inherent risks of scouting and its activities, both current and future, regardless of the level of supervision or my ability and experience. Furthermore, there are no factors or conditions I should disclose to the organizers that would make my participation in scouting activities dangerous. I also acknowledge that it is my duty to follow the rules, instructions, and procedures applicable to the activities in which I participate.
sante_symptomes_texte: I declare that neither I nor anyone in my household has shown symptoms of a cold or flu (including fever, cough, sore throat, respiratory illness, or breathing difficulties) in the last 14 days. If I develop symptoms of a cold or flu after signing this declaration, I commit to not attending or participating in the activities of the Association des Scouts du Canada and its agents for at least 14 days after the last symptom appears.

texte_risques_inherents: I acknowledge being informed about the inherent risks of scouting and its activities, whether current or future, regardless of the level of supervision as well as the level of my ability and experience.
